Name: 魂之独颂歌 Song of Souls
About the game: Fight as an unknown warrior with various weapons, and dive into The Forest of Souls to find the souls of Lost Ancient Kings. Challenge them and get their power, then finally face your terminative destiny. Third-person lite action game This is a indie game that focus on boss fight. Slay to unlock more weapons As you kill more enemies, you can unlock new weapons which have unique attack style. Learn battle skills from different weapons Every weapon has different battle style, light attack combo, heavy attack etc. Learn to make use of your weapon through fights. Find ancients to challenge the souls of Lost Ancient Kings Hardcore difficulty Enemies are highly aggressive and powerful, death is common. Spend souls to gain power Though you might die many times, you can spend souls you collect to upgrade your weapon to challenge again.
